Package bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes

Class Cappuccino

java.lang.Object
bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes.Drink
bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes.HotDrink
bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes.CoffeeBased
bootcamp.oop.drinksProject.DrinksMachine_classes.Cappuccino
All Implemented Interfaces:
Produceable
public class Cappuccino extends CoffeeBased
In this class we are interested in realizing a Hot Cappuccino drink according to its fields and data.
Author:
Faraj. This class "Cappuccino" is based on the father class "CoffeeBased". In addition of the hot drink fields, the Cappuccino drink must have: a Two shot of Espresso and the rest of the cup is Milk.

    • Cappuccino

      public Cappuccino(float volume, float price, int drinkTypeIndex, float temperature, float quantityOfSugar, int hotTypeIndex, int coffeeBasedTypeIndex)
      Construct a HotCappuccino Drink object from 7 parameters.
      Parameters:
      volume - of the HotCappuccino drink.
      price - of the HotCappuccino drink.
      drinkTypeIndex - : Hot
      temperature - : A Random value.
      quantityOfSugar - : A random value of the quantity of Sugar.(0 to 5)
      hotTypeIndex - : CoffeeBased.
      coffeeBasedTypeIndex - : Cappuccino.
